knimeNode.name: Output Files
knimeNode.shortDescription: Stores the incoming files in a selected folder with user specified file name.

fullDescription.intro:
Stores the incoming files in a selected folder with user specified file name.
The file name of the output files will be <user-specified-file-name>_idx.extension. Where idx is 1-n where n is the number of output files.

ports.inPort: URI port object containing the files to store in a selected folder given a file name pattern.

views.view: Open the folder containing the output files.
